channel.title: [508] Changing the Login Text? [508]
channel.description:
We'll i've decided to give up on 317's as they all seem to be the same these days and i've basically learned all i need to about them.. I'd like to extend my Runescape Private Server coding knowledge by going on to 508's +. Basically im a noob coder with 508's to be honest about it. I've seen the files in one and its very diffrent from a 508 and there isnt a main file like client.java like there is in a 317 that stores all you need..
I know its not really a spoon feeding community but if you could help i would really like that. :) Basically what i want to know right now is how i change the in game login text on the chat box.
P.S - I've searched youtube and google.. couldn't find anything so i came here.

item.title: [508] Changing the Login Text? [508]
item.dc:creator: @iDontRun iDontRun
item.description:
@iDontRun wrote:

Your a life saver.
P.S - worked like a charm.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing the Login Text? [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Login.java

It should be about 1/2 way down.

Or you can just search for the current log in text and change it.

Read full topic
